parsing_failure.reason: Modern website likely uses JavaScript/React to load property data dynamically
parsing_failure.html_structure: Server-side rendered HTML with minimal property data - listings loaded via JavaScript

website_analysis.technology_stack: Apache server, PHP backend, React/JavaScript frontend
website_analysis.page_title: Homes For Sale Near Deep Creek Lake | Deep Creek Real Estate
website_analysis.likely_structure: Single Page Application (SPA) that loads property data via AJAX/API calls
scraping_challenges: Property data likely loaded from separate API endpoints
Anti-scraping measures may be in place

recommendations.immediate_fix: Stop using the scraper and clearly indicate sample data
better_approaches: Use a real estate API like RentSpree, MLSGrid, or Bridge Interactive
Contact Railey Realty for official API access
Implement browser automation (Playwright/Puppeteer) to handle JavaScript
Analyze network requests to find the actual API endpoints
recommendations.quick_solution: Label all properties as 'Sample Data' and add disclaimer
